structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.catch_line: Authority to convey to commission fee simple title.
law.text: For the purpose of providing county buildings for county purposes or to remodel or improve same, the county of which the members of such commission are residents may convey to the county buildings commission a fee simple title, with covenant of general warranty, to a site now held or hereafter acquired by such county.
